website_summaries.verdict: The Verizon Wireless USB760 modem offers great connection speeds and coverage, and it doubles as a storage device.  However, its rigid, nonswivel design makes it difficult to use in tight situations.
pros: The Verizon Wireless USB760 modem offers EV-DO Rev
A data speeds through Verizon's network
It also works with Mac and Linux systems and offers up to 8GB of storage

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this, I was expecting some reasonable service. However, what I got is a device that fluctuates between zero bars and three bars. This can be very troublesome when I am downloading a file, streaming a video, or playing some online game. I am paying 80 dollars a month instead of a 50 dollar virgin mobile since virgin mobile has the worst customer service, but now I am rather regretting it. This device is what I would call a pure garbage that can't even hold a stable connection. Don't buy this unless you are planning to use it right next to a verizon internet tower.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Jun Seo

customer_reviews.title: Just finished installing it all online
customer_reviews.text: Took about 40 minutes to download the updates and press the "get access" button on the VZ access manager to write this review. Spent $50 on the 1gb for a month. Waited ten minutes and re opened vz access manager. Updated something again and it recognized my new acct. Seems pretty quick. Happy it works, but is spendy for the service. Drive arrived in three days of ordering with no instructions, which I really did not need. Looks like you can track usage from the vz manager, which is great. No need for other software or to talk to verizon at all.
customer_reviews.author: bustwelve

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time,is the only plus. I followed all instructions , but when it came time to pick a payment plan,it shut down and started over.....5 times in a row. I'm sick of these companies selling garbage that doesn't even work. Nothing against Amazon, I love you guys!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Device
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with my Verizon connection and being told by VZ's service desk that they suspected it was a "hardware issue", this device was a replacement for my 4 year old one. Brand new, in the box, exactly like my old one! Very simple to call VZ support and have them code it into my account. Setup took less than 10 minutes. Unfortunately, I now know that mine is not a "hardware issue" but rather a "network issue."
customer_reviews.author: beta1262

customer_reviews.title: Good With prepaid from verizon
customer_reviews.text: I Got this because i wanted to be able to get on the internet wherever i went whether it be a bus or in the park. i recieved this knowing it wouldnt work without some kind of payment method. I went to walmart today and bought a $50 Verizon Prepaid Card thingy. i put the code in and automaticaly was able to get on the internet. Works Well With (WWW) videos Music games Facebook Doesn't work well with ... ill tell you when i find one...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: When I went to register they told me the only available plan was $80 for 5g good for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I was told by Verizon that the programs available were $60 for 3g and $90 for 10g. When I went to register they told me the only available plan was $80 for 5g good for 30 days. I was given contrary information on the phone. I will look for another way to get internet when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lannea

customer_reviews.title: Great modem
customer_reviews.text: We are grandfathered in an unlimited plan so we have to stay with 3G. We got this modem to replace the old which had worn out. I've had this a couple of years, and I can say it's a winner! We use a lot of data every month and this works perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: You need internet to get internet
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come like the picture , No instructions , Need internet to get the internet , They basically give a device and say screw off figure it out. All I got were 2 paper cards and was left to understand the program alone. Luckily my phone has internet, so after super slowly trying to find the end. Uhhg stress in a box.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed!! Our local Verizon store would not take ...
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT work w/ any of my devices. I am very disappointed!! Our local Verizon store would not take it back b/c they haven't sold this item in 2years. This was a poor product that Amazon should not carry.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: This modem works great
customer_reviews.text: I need a backup for my DSL since I work from home. This came with a user guide and it also had a sticker which said to install the software first from the CD before inserting the modem in the PC. It also automatically updated the software which worked fine. The software works great connecting to the network and also to purchase a plan online without having to talk to someone on the phone. You can select from several plans: one day, one month, etc. And the speed on the 3G network is good. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dogflower

customer_reviews.title: I tried to  use the device  I tried to activate  the device  but it never worked  at all
customer_reviews.text: To use the internet but it didn't work I tried to activate the device but it did not activate it at all so t can not use it until I have time to go to Verizon to activate in person.
customer_reviews.author: mark shipley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best items I have ever bought. I love this little modem.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Senior

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CAMPING TRIPS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to use when we were camping where there was no internet coverage. The monthly fee is rather pricey (for us anyway) ;however, it served our purpose well. I would recommend this device to those where internet cover is not available.
customer_reviews.author: S. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart purchase, unless you really need it
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had no prepaid time on it. I had to pay another 69.69 to get one month of Internet, with average dialup speed. Not a smart purchase, unless you really need it. I will never buy from this vender again.
customer_reviews.author: N.D. Nasery

customer_reviews.title: It works but....
customer_reviews.text: I had a few troubles with it and I think it is expensive to keep using. It works but reloading it for continued use will be too expensive for my blood, finding alternatives
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: For the moment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend to use for school and her job. Unfortunately the plans are a lot higher than what they should be in my opinion, so we switch to Time Warner Cable. For the same price of the 5 GB plan, she now get unlimited.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: do not purchase this item--it did not work and I ...
customer_reviews.text: do not purchase this item--it did not work and I spent hours on the phone with Verizon all to no avail--needed the product to work and over $100 in additional investment no luck and could not return item

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on old unlimited Verizon 3G plans
customer_reviews.text: Was able to activate it on my Verizon 3G unlimited account without any issues. Can be used as a replacement device for the old unlimited 3G plans. (2008-2009) that are not available anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for someone that occasionally needs internet service without being locked into a contract. When no Wi-Fi is available this little gadget works great. Excellent signal strength. Have a need for it only about 3 to 4 times a year but can't live without it. Very easy to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Kruebbe

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Mac
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine with my PC. Too bad I prefer my Mac. I ended up buying a MIFI2200 so I can use my IPad too. Just make sure you don't leave it running and turn automatic updates off!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moser

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. My old one finally wore out-this was the same model I was accustomed to using. Works great and come quickly. No problems with it.

customer_reviews.title: was a good company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: was a good company to deal with, product was not what was expected and did a return, they handled it quickly and efficiently.

customer_reviews.text: If you still have the cheaper (discontinued) 3GB service, and want to keep it, buy this modum as a spare.

customer_reviews.title: Verizon USB760 3G Prepaid USB Broadband Device.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with order. I am going to use it where there is non Wi-Fi for my pad and laptop.

customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Excellant price and easy to get on the system. Ordered a second one for a spare. This is a great modem.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This plug and play device was simple enough to set up, even the first time. It was a lifesaver when we were travelling and didn't always have access to reliable wifi.

customer_reviews.title: need to return

customer_reviews.title: very good results
customer_reviews.text: Of course there is always a price to pay, and that is the monthly fee to use this. Traveled to yellowstone park from east coast, and used this with laptop for internet searching. Never failed to connect by main highways. Good thing is the monthly fee can be limited to each month you need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: NJ tradesman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent experience!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Verizon USB760 prepaid mobile broaband device. It was shipped rapidly by the seller, was in perfect shape, and was everything I expected! I would definately order from this seller again and am entirely please with the product. We live part time in a remote part of Texas, I have tried every internet card out there and this is the only one that works in our area. I can and have played World of Warcraft on this card whereas I couldn't even check email with AT&T, Cricket, Sprint, etc... it was easy to activate, I don't pay for what I don't need. Would recommend this card to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy, quick installation. The USB arrived quickly and I had no problems. I would recommend this to anyone trying to avoid a contract.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Mobile broadband
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for our vacation home! We only pay for the broadband service when we need it! The device was purchased on Amazon and saved us quite a bit of money compared to the device purchased at the Verizon store. Set up was easy. And speed is great!

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Used usb modem works like new
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described . Am using it now and it works great and is faster than the one I lost. Quick delivery and no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT

customer_reviews.title: Overall goo
customer_reviews.text: The setup was a little difficult, but after that it works well. I rate 4 stars because I think it's a good product, minus the setup process.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: my usb modem works fine, just as i had hoped. I purchased the antenna for it to improve reception in buildings and that has helped, along with a usb extension cord to move the modem away from the laptop.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was flexible like the Pantech
customer_reviews.text: It is a 2" stick that gets in the way when installed on the side of my MacBook. I worry about it getting broken or worse, breaking the USB connection inside the laptop. The Pantech would flex up and be out of the way.

customer_reviews.title: USB Broadband Device
customer_reviews.text: The Verizon usb760 worked the way I wanted too. I was on vacation in the mountains which was very remote and still had to do school work. I was very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: product meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: It is a great tool for getting my online homework done. I would recommend it. Sometimes the reception is low, but besides that, all is well.

customer_reviews.title: Verizon USB760

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: The USB 760 works great. The item arrived on time. It is working perfectly with Verizon Wireless 3G service. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: I like the device itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the device itself, its Embedded Works that I have an issue with. I purchased this device from them, and falsely made the assumption this was a new device. It is STILL REGISTERED to another Verizon customer and Verizon wilL NOT activate it. I am trying to return it but you have to wait to hear back from them. I have unlimited data on an old plan from Verizon and they will only honor that with limited devices now, this being one of them. I am ordering from another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: KerryH1103

product_meta.title: Verizon USB760 3G Prepaid USB Broadband Device
product_meta.description: With the smallest form factor in the market, the USB760 USB Modem with NovaSpeed provides high-speed access on our 1x/EVDO network. No CD is required for installation. Just insert the device, allow the drivers to auto-install, and VZAccess Manager Installer automatically launches. The USB760 is compatible with computers that support a Type A USB port and comes equipped with hot-swappable removal memory support, up to 8GB. It also comes with a built-in, high-performance internal antenna with no external parts to break.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars119 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
